Description.Text: Elite World Van is a contemporary 5-star hotel offering plush accommodation near the heart of Van. Highlights include a good location close to Van Museum, two restaurants, a bar/club, beauty salon and a luxury spa with an indoor swimming pool, children's pool, gym, sauna, steam room and private treatment rooms. Van is a medium-sized city situated on the eastern shore of Lake Van. It has a beautiful rugged landscape. Nearby places of interest include Van Museum, Van Castle and Akdamar Island on Lake Van. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Van destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise building with a distinctive facade. Facilities include a beauty salon and a luxury spa with an indoor swimming pool, children's pool, gym, sauna, steam room and private treatment rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 28sqm and decorated in an elegant style with patterned carpets and rich fabrics. They feature a sitting area with an armchair and a small table. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, mini-bar, air-conditioning and a safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a Jacuzzi and separate walk-in shower. Elite restaurant offers Turkish and international cuisine in a contemporary dining room with dark wood floors, while Tepe Ocakbasi serves Turkish cuisine in a stylish space with floor-to-ceiling windows. Guests can also enjoy live music, tea and coffee and a range of cakes and pastries at the Elite World Club Lounge. The One Bar and Night Club serves delicious cocktails and international wines and boasts a dance floor. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service and offers a complimentary airport shuttle service.
